name: outbreak.info SARS-CoV-2 data explorer
description: Explores COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 data with variant surveillance reports, data on cases and deaths, and a searchable research library. Tracks over 40 million combinations of Pango lineages and individual mutations, across over 7,000 locations, to provide insights for researchers, public health officials and the general public.
owner_name: Scripps Research, GISAID, and others (international consortium)
